ACameraID.description: SetObjID of the camera to activate when passing through the object in the opposite direction.

ALinkObjID.description: SetObjID of another CameraCollisionBoard. The camera will reset when Sonic passes through all linked boards. If the ID is 0, the camera will return to normal.

BCameraID.description: SetObjID of the camera to activate when passing through the object.

BLinkObjID.description: SetObjID of another CameraCollisionBoard. The camera will reset when Sonic passes through all linked boards. If the ID is 0, the camera will return to normal.

EaseTime_AtoB.description: Time taken to swap between cameras.

EaseTime_BtoA.description: Time taken to swap between cameras.

Extra.name: A wall which activates custom cameras depending on how Sonic passes through it.
